short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the most visited sites on a popup window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better Top Sites is a handy tool that helps you quickly access 
your most frequently visited websites. It displays a list of your top sites directly 
on a popup window, no need for bookmarks.

• Quick Access: Easily navigate to your favorite websites with just a click.
• Efficiency: Save time by eliminating the need to search for frequently visited sites.
• Visual Favicons: Show visual icons for each site, making it easier to identify them at a glance.
• Dark theme: Choose between dark and light theme.

Changelog:
• Added option: Compact Mode, which only shows the title when enabled.
